column2: you know i'm thinking about letting emma have her first cookie
she has cookies all the time
i've never given her a cookie
and for the record i've also never given her a frosting from a can
hey rach the adoption agency needs letters of recommendation and we were wondering if you would write one for us
u u um i think there's been an oversight
joey we would've asked you we just thought you wouldn't be interested
yeah it's just we don't think of you as really being so much with the words
whoo weh hey weh hey whoo hey
i gotta a lot of nice stuff to say about you guys ok
and i know how much you wanna have a baby you know and i would love to help you get one
then joey we want you to do it
alright let me see how i'm gonna start
today is mike and my one year anniversary
your first date your first kiss first time you had s x
so you must be going to somewhere fancy to celebrate
hey you know what i've never had a one year anniversary before so no matter where we go i'm wearing something fancy pants and
i'm gonna put on my finest jewelry and we're gonna have s x in a public rest room
chandler won't even have s x in our bathroom
that's where people make number two
i'd love to but i really have to grade these papers
oh ross you gave a b to a pottery barn catalogue
well it had some good ideas take off your shirt
i have to talk to you
charlie this is rachel's sister amy
i grew up on your block
we had thanksgiving together last year
i had a baby with your sister
did i buy a falafel from you yesterday
she thinks i need pec implants
the days of our lives guy
always nice to meet a fan
so now what are you doing here
let me just check on the baby
why did you change it ella was so much prettier
i just sell middle eastern food from a cart
hey your english is getting better
i know she may be the hottest girl i've ever hated
i want it to sound smart but
i don't know any big words or anything so
why don't you use your thesaurus
you highlight the word you want to change
go under tools and the thesaurus generates
you can pick the word that sounds smartest
brainy bright clever i love this thing
look out ladies joey tribbiani's got the whole package
no i was talking about your bedding
and the elevator opens up right into the living room
do you remember my old boyfriend mark
but he travels a lot so he's hardly ever there
it sounds a little bit like you like the apartment more than you like
i told you he was old
oh honey you know i once also almost married somebody that i didn’t love
how we used to make out all the time after you went to sleep
uhm so but anyway listen not marrying barry was the best decision that i ever ever made
your soulmate is out there somewhere
someone that is your age that is smart that is fun and that you care about
i’m gonna marry myron and keep looking for mr right
uhm sir could you move your nachos
can’t believe it's been a whole year
this has been the best year
this has been the best year of my life
i never thought i could love someone this much
you’re so generous and kind and you're amazing in bed it’s our anniversary
knicks fans please turn your attention to the big screen on the score board
someone has a special question to ask
oh it’s so tacky and impersonal
oh it’s the worst way to propose
and i think you’ll be very very happy
it’s the longest i ever spent on a computer without looking at p0rn
some of the words are a little too sophisticated for ya
alright what was this sentence originally
oh ‘they are warm nice people with big hearts’
and that became ‘they are humid prepossessing homo sapiens with full sized aortic pumps
yeah yeah and hey i really mean it dude
hey joey i don’t think we can use this
well because you signed it baby kangaroo tribbiani
hey why don’t you stop worrying about sounding smart and just be yourself
you don’t need a thesaurus just write from here your full sized aortic pump
i took your advice i left myron
oh i am so proud of you
so can i stay with you
but erin brockovich had her own house
rach why does she have bags
well i’m staying with you guys
amy kept kicking me in her sleep yelling ‘myron get off
but uhm we're getting rid of her right
rach please tell me we’re getting rid of her
last night i was finishing off a pizza and she said uoh oh oh a moment on the lips forever on the hips
i don’t need that kind of talk in my house
well joey uhm look i know that she’s difficult but i think it’s really good that she’s here
'cause we will appreciate it more when she’s gone
look you know when i first moved to the city i was a lot like her
i was spoiled self centered and you guys really took care of me
whatever i have really appreciated it 'cause i don’t think i would be the person that i am today if it wasn’t for you guys
see i wanna help amy the way you guys helped me
and i know it’s gonna take patience but that’s ok
amy that’s what i was supposed to wear today that’s why i hung it on the door
oh sweety you can’t pull this off
i was thinking that maybe now it'd be a good time for us to sit down and you know talk about your future
i’m gonna go get my eyebrows shaped
i’m curvy and i like it
i just had the worst anniversary ever
tell her about us last year
oh well i bought chandler a five hundred dollar watch and he wrote me a rap song
well mine was worse than that
we were at the game and this guy proposed to his girlfriend on the big screen thing
well that’s what i said but it turns out mike was planning on proposing to me that same way last night
oh my god mike was gonna propose
well do you wanna marry him
yes but after i dumped on the way he was gonna propose to me i don’t think he’s ever gonna ask again
i mean i said no in barbados and now this
if i were a guy and
did i just say if i were a guy
maybe you don't need him to propose to you maybe you can propose to him
oh i don't know i don't know isn't that a little desperate
oh i don't think it was desperate i think it was amazing
well do you think i should propose
i think it could be kind of great
ok ok so how should i do it
how about at a game on the big screen
he obviously thinks that's a nice way to be proposed to plus he'd never suspect it
but what would a guy think
that's interesting since she died seven years ago
who got her condo in boca
i have back to back classes
did molly say what she had
i don't think that's what this is
can any of you watch emma
no i've got work and then i'm proposing
great shoot what are we gonna do
well can i talk to you for a sec
um i do not want her baby sitting our child
well for one thing she keeps calling her ella
fine we'll call the next one ella
i don't want her watching our baby
ross i am trying to help her become a better person
this is a huge breakthrough for her
she just offered to do something for another human being
ross i'm telling you she's giving up getting her eyebrows shaped to do this alright
do you understand how important that is in our world
listen i couldn't help but overhear
listen let me do this alright
i really wanna help you guys out and plus rachel's been so wonderful to me
so how much does it pay
how's the second draft of the letter coming
in fact i just dropped it off at the agency
can you print out another copy
no i didn't use the computer
felt more personal to hand write it
i didn't try to sound smart at all
oh my god oh my god that letter is gonna go in our file
we're never gonna get a kid
no we're gonna be one of those old couples that collects orchids or has a lot of birds
i'll just call the agency and tell them to throw out the letter
somebody just dropped off a handwritten recommendation letter and
just tell me on the way to the bird store
they thought it was very smart of us to have a child write the recommendation letter
they thought joey was a child
she guessed 8 9 based on his drawings
hey what did you guys do today
ella wanted to go out so we went shopping and got some sushi
and i got you a present for letting me stay with you
doesn't it make her nose look smaller
how could you do this without telling me
well if i had told you then it wouldn't have been surprise now would it
oh my god oh my god here comes ross
why did something happen to his falafel cart
oh why is she wearing her hat so low
nah i don't really want her to see
because there are so many terrible sights in this world
or that thing in joey's refrigerator
it was in a milk carton but it looked like meat
please tell me those are clip ons
did she do this to her
i told you we shouldn't have left emma with her
i know i know and you were right ross
you are soo irresponsible i am never letting you baby sit ever again
hey you know what this kid needs me okay
she needs to have a cool fun aunt
monica can be cool and fun at organized indoor projects
all i wanted to do was help you try to figure out what to do with your life and this is how you repay me
well i don't need you to help me because i already know what i'm going to do with my life
i am going to be a baby stylist
i'm gonna help babies learn how to accessorize what colors to wear what clothes are slimming
babies don't care if they're slim
why do you keep looking at the screen
well i think you should wait
if you don't hold it in you don't get all the nutrients
knicks fans please turn your attention to the big screen on the scoreboard
someone has a special question to ask
guess we know who wears the pants in that family
well i'm glad you liked my letter
no my mommy and daddy aren't home right now
joey get amy's bags she is moving out
you put holes in my baby's ears
yeah well at least now people will know she is a girl
i can't believe i ever even tried to help you
ever since i got here you have been nothing but negative
you didn't want me to marry the old guy with the great apartment
then i tried to help your daughter to de emphasize her flaws and suddenly i am the bad guy
she has a lot of crap
when i moved in here i thought this is gonna be so great
just us sisters back together again like when we were kids except without that stupid jill
who has gotten fat by the way
mom said she gained like fifteen pounds
i thought she was on atkins
see this is what i wanted
two sisters talking about real stuff
oh i can give you that
i just i kept trying to make you a better person but you're
you're already a pretty perfect version of what you are
i've got to admit emma does look cute
that woman at the game didn't know what she was talking about
but please let's just forget the whole thing
however and whenever you decide to propose i promise i'll say yes
whether you know it is in a basketball game or in sky writing or you know like some lame guy in a cheesy movie who hides it in the cake
it's in the cake isn't it
how do i keep ruining this
i keep trying to propose in these stupid ways and all i wanna do is tell you that i love you and i want to spend the rest of my life with you
there's no one else in the world i would ask to marry me
but i wanna take care of you have babies with you and grow old with you
phoebe buffay will you marry me
it's almost if people don't want to hear that their babies are ugly
